Who Am I?

I'm a momma of 2 beautiful, sweet girls. I'm a runner, a rock climber, a military spouse. I love programming and web development, but found it easier to solidify my own understanding of concepts by teaching others. From that idea grew this blog where I teach others what I know, what I'm learning, and how I'm making myself more techy every day.

The Blog

Check out my blog where I tackle simple HTML elements, complex coding topics, and step by step coding tutorials.

Codepedia

Looking for just the gist of a coding topic? Check out the codepedia for quick info on elements, selectors, and other web development and coding subjct matter.
